projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack MERN e-commerce platform featuring product management, shopping cart, order processing, and Stripe payment gateway integration.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive and modern personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and achievements, built with React and TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Crypto Trading Simulator
projects.description: A real-time crypto trading simulation app with countdown timers, profit/loss logic, and balance updates using Binance API.

projects.name: Blog Platform
projects.description: A dynamic blogging platform with user authentication, post creation, comments, and rich text editor support.

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A MERN-based task management app allowing users to create, update, and delete tasks with authentication.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather forecast app that fetches live weather data from OpenWeather API and displays real-time conditions.

projects.name: Chat Application
projects.description: A real-time chat application with WebSocket support, private rooms, and message history.

projects.name: Online Quiz System
projects.description: An interactive quiz application with timer, score calculation, and multiple-choice questions.

projects.name: Notes App
projects.description: A simple CRUD-based notes app with persistent storage and search functionality.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: A fully functional calculator app with advanced arithmetic and percentage operations.

projects.name: To-Do List
projects.description: A to-do list app with task categorization, local storage, and responsive design.

projects.name: Memory Game
projects.description: A fun card-matching memory game with dynamic scoring and reset options.

projects.name: Typing Speed Test
projects.description: A typing test app that calculates typing speed (WPM) and accuracy in real-time.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: A financial tracker app that allows users to manage income, expenses, and calculate balance dynamically.

projects.name: Movie Search App
projects.description: A movie search app using OMDb API to fetch and display movies with details like ratings and actors.

projects.name: Digital Clock
projects.description: A live digital clock app displaying real-time hours, minutes, and seconds.

projects.name: Form Validation App
projects.description: A dynamic form with custom validation, error messages, and responsive design.

projects.name: Image Gallery
projects.description: A responsive image gallery with hover effects, modal preview, and animations.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A React-based weather dashboard with 5-day forecasts, temperature charts, and city search.

projects.name: Interactive Card Flip
projects.description: A CSS and JavaScript-based 3D flip card effect for product and portfolio showcases.
